page.title: 11Industry in Millbrook
page.content:
We surveyed the factories in our own square & we found that working conditions are generally clean, tidy, & pleasant to work in. Most factories have approximately one hour for lunch but some factories work right through depending on what kind of job they do. Breaks for tea & coffee are usually about ten to fifteen minutes.
Holidays in most factories are roughly three to four weeks a year plus a couple of days for a bank holiday.
Working times in the factories are roughly thirty to fourty hours a week.
